api_list.name: Get song by ID
api_list.description: Get a song by its ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kjoller.p.rapidapi.com/songs/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kjoller.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all songs
api_list.description: This endpoint will return every song from the database.

import requests

url = "https://kjoller.p.rapidapi.com/songs"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kjoller.p.rapidapi.com"
